documents.document: Up to standard...Recommended Me and my dad and my sister were there for 2 nights. We went to Sydney for an exhibition on September 24th. Location next to Hyde park not so far from George street and about 10-15 mins walk to exhibtion hall and Darling Harbour. Room could be a bit bigger and bed could be bigger too since there were 3 of us. Me and my dad had to sleep on the same bed and lucky that we were not a big guy so we didn't have much problem. Mariott standard so I would recommend to stay here

Great location The hotel was very nice, clean room, great location. The only problem with this hotel is their expensive parking $40/day. My recommedation is they shold provide free/inexpensive wireless access to customer
